name: Sprout Short Sleeve
description:
CLOSEOUT SALE!!!!! GET ONE WHILE THEY LAST!!!!

Sprout Eco Apparel shirts are made from 90% bamboo, a quick growing and extremely eco friendly plant. These shirts are very comfortable, have great elasticity and drapability. You'll be proud to wear this eco friendly shirt anywhere. Great to wear anywhere! 

This shirt WILL keep you cool in the Summer heat! 

Made from 90% Bamboo, 5% Cotton, 5% Spandex. 

Bamboo is naturally hypoallergenic, and naturally antimicrobial.
